I would also recommend "The Skull"". The movie is based on a short story by H.P Lovecraft called "The Skull" published in the magazine Pulp Fiction Volume 1 Number 4 in 1950. The movie stars William Baldwin, Richard Matheson, and John Huston, and it has been praised for its adaptation of Lovecraft's short story and its performances by Baldwin, Matheson, and Huston.
In conclusion, both "Pride and Prejudice" and "The Skull" are excellent movies that have received critical acclaim. I would highly recommend both of these movies to anyone who is interested in high-quality cinema.
